text: 6.26: Zo 6.11-12Zisas mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Gu guigira nde nzuai, nde mba gu muuŋgi mirikori, nde nta gangi, nde nta ndɨkndɨgap, gu mba nde khɨvigi bigi, nde nta ndɨɨriveŋ kaŋgiap na ndi gari fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nde gu mba meeŋthɨgi vikntuuven nde nɨɨŋgim, nde nta mbegav, ndavi givav, nde nera nzuav na ndi gari.
